purpose: To explore the capabilities of a self-building autonomous agent with minimal complexity
principle: Leverages Python and basic AI/ML libraries to create a self-improving agent through iterative learning and task execution
reusability: Designed for experimentation and educational purposes, allowing users to modify and extend the agent's capabilities
limitations: Limited by its simplicity, lacks advanced features and scalability for production use
name: babyagi-2o
description: the simplest self-building general autonomous agent
highlight: Simplest self-building general autonomous agent for experimentation
